title: Essential App
comment: Now that I got Google NOT displaying my real name, I can start reviewing again. This app is essential to all technical users. I don't use it as often now because of other communication apps that have a simpler UI, but I do return to adb when I need to accomplish something out of the ordinary. It's like returning to the command-line on a PC to cut to the chase!

title: pushing the app to mobile became slow?
comment: I am not sure if the problem is in the app or in something else but pushing the app through adbWireless used to be faster (almost instant) before. now it takes around 25-30 seconds to push the app to the device.

title: Great job
comment: To connect to adb you usually have to plug in a usb cable, then there was wireless adb but you still had to connect from your computer.  Now this developer has made the process as simple as pressing the widget and it automatically connects to your computer!!! Make sure you setup adbWirelessService to get the most out of this great app! Awesome app I'm gonna go check if there's a donate version
like it

title: Works fine, but...
comment: It works well in what it is made for. However... (1) Why does it keep waking up alone, if it is only a on/off switch?? (2) Really ugly and unnecessarily *HUGE* widget button (look at the images above): anything but elegant. (3) At the same time, an almost invisible (for dark themes) notification icon. (4) No security: when ON,  *anyone* in your network has total access to your phone.
